title: Galaxy Buds Live review: good beans, no compromises
description: The Galaxy Buds Live are Samsungs latest true wireless earbuds and for $169.99 the Buds Live have a style all their own, well actually they share it with a damn kidney bean. But bean jokes aside, although these wireless earbuds come in a unique shape, they retain the solid hardware and audio quality we have come to expect from the galaxy line.   Read the full review:   If you buy something from a Verge link, Vox Media may earn a commission.
